title: LHCb Upgrade Capital Bridging Funds 2014-15
abstractText: See the application "LHCb Upgrade: Beyond the Energy Frontier", Council Reference ST/L002930/1
findingsText: Purchased network analyser that will be used for development of opto-electrical boards for the readout system of the vertex detector of the LHCb upgrade Measuring fast data throughputs Creative Economy,Electronics
